          <title>
            <string language="en">Repulsion and attraction in magnetic bars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstossung und Anziehung in den magnetischen 
Stäben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Répulsion et attraction dans les barres 
magnétiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Repulsion e atração em barras magnéticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Repulsione ed attrazione in barre magnetiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απέχθεια και έλξη στις μαγνητικές ράβδους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Repulsión y atracción en barras magnéticas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations for the determination of magnetic poles. This can be used as a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">magnetic repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen für die 
Ermittlung der Magnetpole. Dieses kann als beschriftende Übung 
verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations pour la 
détermination des pôles magnétiques. Ceci peut être utilisé
comme exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações para a 
determinação de pólos magnéticos. Isto pode ser usado como 
um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni per la 
determinazione dei poli magnetici. Ciò può essere usata come 
esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων για τον προσδιορισμό των 
μαγνητικών πόλων. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση 
μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones para la 
determinación de polos magnéticos. Esto se puede utilizar como
ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
